components/common/___css:
<style>
meta.foundation-version {font-family:"/5.5.3/"}
meta.foundation-mq-small {font-family:"/only screen/";width:0}
meta.foundation-mq-small-only {font-family:"/only screen and (max-width: 551px)/";width:0}
meta.foundation-mq-medium {font-family:"/only screen and (min-width:551px)/";width:551px}
meta.foundation-mq-medium-only {font-family:"/only screen and (min-width:551px) and (max-width:801px)/";width:551px}
meta.foundation-mq-large {font-family:"/only screen and (min-width:801px)/";width:801px}
meta.foundation-mq-large-only {font-family:"/only screen and (min-width:801px) and (max-width:1261px)/";width:801px}
meta.foundation-mq-xlarge {font-family:"/only screen and (min-width:1261px)/";width:1261px}
meta.foundation-mq-xlarge-only {font-family:"/only screen and (min-width:1261px) and (max-width:1681px)/";width:1261px}
meta.foundation-mq-xxlarge {font-family:"/only screen and (min-width:1681px)/";width:1681px}
meta.foundation-data-attribute-namespace {font-family:false}

/*** FONTS ***/
@font-face {font-family: 'Gotham Book';font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;
	src: url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Book.otf'}}'), 
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Book.eot'}}'),
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Book.woff'}}');
}
@font-face {font-family: 'Gotham Medium';font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;
	src: url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Medium.otf'}}'), 
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Medium.eot'}}'),
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Medium.woff'}}'),
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Medium.ttf'}}');
}
@font-face {font-family: 'Gotham Bold';font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;
	src: url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Bold.otf'}}'), 
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Bold.eot'}}'),
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Bold.woff'}}');
}
@font-face {font-family: 'Gotham Light';font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;
	src: url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Light.otf'}}'), 
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Light.eot'}}'),
	url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Gotham%20Light.woff'}}');
}

@media all and (min-width: 600px){
	@font-face {font-family: 'Segoe UI,arial';font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;
		src: url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Segoe%20UI,arial.otf'}}'), 
		url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Segoe%20UI.eot'}}'),
		url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Segoe%20UI.ttf'}}');
	}
	@font-face {font-family: 'Segoe UI Bold';font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;
		src: url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Segoe%20UI%20Bold.otf'}}'), 
		url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Segoe%20UI%20Bold.eot'}}'),
		url('{{cdn '/assets/fonts/Segoe%20UI%20Bold.ttf'}}');
	}
}

/*** DEFAULT COLORS ***/
.blue {color: #0064a3;}
.aqua {color: #08a4d7;}
.charcoal {color: #d9d9d9;}
.gold {color: #ffce4a;}
.blood {color: #b12704;}
.goldOther {color: #ffbf11;}

/*** UNIVERSAL ***/
body {margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: arial; cursor: default;}
a {color: inherit; text-decoration: none; -o-transition:.3s; -ms-transition:.3s; -moz-transition:.3s; -webkit-transition:.3s; transition:.3s;}
.mobileHide {display: block;}
.mobileOnly {display: none;}
fieldset {border: none;}

/*** BIGCOMMERCE MODAL ***/
.loadingNotification {left:0;position:fixed;right:0;text-align:center;top:3rem;transform-style:preserve-3d;transition:all .2s ease-out;z-index:500}
.loadingNotification.ng-hide-add-active,.loadingNotification.ng-hide-remove {opacity:0;top:3.6rem;-ms-transform:scale(.9);transform:scale(.9)}
.loadingNotification.ng-hide-remove-active {opacity:1;top:3rem;-ms-transform:scale(1);transform:scale(1)}
.loadingNotification-label {background:#666;border-radius:4px;color:#fff;display:inline-block;font-size:15px;padding:.35714rem .78571rem}
.loadingOverlay-container {min-height:120px;position:relative}
.loadingOverlay {background:rgba(45,45,45,.9);bottom:0;height:100%;left:0;opacity:1;position:absolute;right:0;top:0;transition:all 250ms ease-out;width:100%}
.loadingOverlay::before {height:2.85714rem;width:2.85714rem;border-radius:2.85714rem;border:2px solid;border-color:#fff #fff #989898 #989898;content:"";display:block;left:0;margin:0 auto;position:absolute;right:0;top:50%;-ms-transform:translateY(-50%) rotate(0);transform:translateY(-50%) rotate(0);transform-style:preserve-3d;animation:spin .5s infinite cubic-bezier(.69,.31,.56,.83)}
.card-body>:first-child,.card-figcaption-body>:first-child {margin-top:0}
.loadingOverlay.ng-enter,.loadingOverlay.ng-leave.ng-leave-active {opacity:0}
.loadingOverlay.ng-enter.ng-enter-active,.loadingOverlay.ng-leave {opacity:1}
@keyframes spin {0% {transform:translateY(-50%) rotate(0)}
100% {transform:translateY(-50%) rotate(360deg)}}
.modal,.slick-loading .slick-slide,.slick-loading .slick-track{visibility:hidden}
.modal {-ms-transform:translateY(-50%);transform:translateY(-50%)}
body.has-activeModal {overflow:hidden}
.modal-background {background:#2d2d2d;background:rgba(45,45,45,.95);bottom:0;display:none;position:fixed;right:0;top:0;z-index:1004;left:0}
.has-activeModal .modal-background {display:block}
.modal {border-radius:0;display:none;width:100%;z-index:1005;background-color:#fff;border:0 solid #e8e8e8;box-shadow:none;position:fixed}
@media only screen and (max-width:1px){.modal{min-height:100vh}}
.modal .column,.modal .columns{min-width:0}
.modal>:first-child{margin-top:0}
.modal>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}
@media only screen and (min-width:1px){.modal{left:0;margin:0 auto;max-width:80%;right:0;width:900px;top:50%!important}}
.modal--large{width:1280px}
.modal--small{width:500px}
.modal-header{border-bottom:1px solid #e8e8e8;padding:1rem 0;position:relative}
.modal-header-title{margin:0}
.modal-body>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}
.modal-footer{border-top:1px solid #e8e8e8;padding:.78571rem 1.5rem;text-align:center}
.modal-footer .button{display:block}
@media (min-width:481px){.modal-footer{text-align:right}
.modal-footer .button{display:inline-block;margin-bottom:0}}
.modal-footer-link{display:inline-block;font-size:15px;margin:0 0 .78571rem}
@media (min-width:481px){.modal-footer-link{display:inline;margin:1.5rem}}
.modal-close{cursor:pointer;font-weight:400;top:1.05rem;right:.75rem;-ms-transform:translateY(none);transform:translateY(none)}
.modal-close .icon{height:1.42857rem;width:1.42857rem}
@media print{.modal{background:#FFF!important;display:none}}

.modal-close {position: absolute; right: 10px; top: 10px; font-size: 24px;}
.modal-content {padding: 20px; width:calc(100%-40px);}

@media all and (max-width: 600px) {
	.modal {height:95vh; top: 30px; overflow-y: scroll;}
}

/*** HEADER ***/
.headerTop {background: #2a2a2a; height: 46px; width: 100%; color: #d9d9d9; font: 12px Gotham Book; line-height: 4em; position: fixed; z-index: 301;}
	.headerTopLink {float: left; cursor: default; padding-right: 17px; padding-left: 17px; -o-transition:.2s; -ms-transition:.2s; -moz-transition:.2s; -webkit-transition:.2s; transition:.2s;}
	.headerTopLinkHover:hover {background: #fff; color: #2a2a2a; opacity: 1;}
	.headerTopLinkBox {position: absolute; color: #000; line-height: 1.2em; padding: 5px 20px 0px 20px; font-size: 14px; background: #fff; width: 350px; height: 0px; top: 44px; z-index: 99; margin-left: -19px; border-radius: 0px 0px 5px 5px; border: 2px solid #000; border-top: none; opacity: 0;  -o-transition:.4s; -ms-transition:.4s; -moz-transition:.4s; -webkit-transition:.4s; transition:.4s; overflow: hidden;}
		.headerTopLinkHover:hover > .headerTopLinkBox {display: block; opacity: 1; height: auto; min-height: 280px;}
		.phoneNumber {color: #0064a3; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 2em;}
		.headerTopBoxInner {padding-bottom: 30px;}
		.headerItalics {font-style: italic;}
		.headerTopBoxInner a {color: #0064a3;}

	.headerTopLink li {list-style-type: none; padding-left: 10px;}
	.headerTopLinkFirst {margin-left: 4%;}
	.headerTopLink .headerTriangle {margin-left: 16px;}
	.headerTopLinkRight {float: right; margin-right: -2px; margin-left: 0px; font-size: 18px; padding-top: 0px; line-height: 2.7em; padding-right: 8px; padding-left: 8px;}
	.headerTopLinkRight img {height: 20px; margin-left: 3px;}
	.headerAmazonPay {padding-top: 8px;}
	.headerPayPal {padding-top: 4px;}
	.headerCC {margin-right: 4%; margin-top: 3px;}

.headerMain {background-image:url('{{cdn '/assets/img/header.jpg'}}'); background-size: cover; width: 100%; height: 100px; background-repeat: no-repeat; clear: both; position: fixed; top: 46px; z-index: 300;}
.headerMainScroll {position: fixed; top: 0px; z-index: 101; box-shadow: 0px 6px 20px -10px #000;}
	.headerLogo {margin-left: 3%; top: 8px; position: absolute; z-index: 2;}
	.searchBox {float: right; position: relative; left: -50%; text-align: left; width: 50%; z-index: 1;}
		.search {width: 70%; height: 42px; font: 14px Gotham Light; padding-left: 10px; margin-top: 28px; outline-width: 0; border: 0px; position: relative; left: 50%; float: left; -webkit-border-radius:0; -webkit-appearance:none}
		.submit {width: 25%; height: 44px; background: #ccc; margin-top: 28px; font: 18px Gotham Book; text-align: center; line-height: 2.5em; font-weight: bold; position: relative; left: 50%; outline-width: 0; -o-transition:.6s; -ms-transition:.6s; -moz-transition:.6s; -webkit-transition:.6s; transition:.6s; float: left;}
		.submit:hover {background: #ffce4a; cursor: pointer;}
	.headerRight {position: absolute; right: 4%; margin-top: 20px; font-family: Gotham Book; color: #fff; line-height: 1.4em; font-weight: bold; z-index: 2;}
	.headerRightGuest {line-height: 1.8em;}
		.headerRightBlock {border-right: 1px solid #74cdfa; padding-right: 20px; float: left;}
			.headerLogin {color: #ffbf11; font-size: 16px;}
			.headerLogout {color: #fff; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1em;}
			.headerMyAccount {font-size: 16px; color: #fff;}
			.weAccept {font-size: 14px; line-height: 3.4em;}
			@media all and (max-width: 900px){.headerMyAccount {font-size: 14px;}}
			.headerLogin:hover {color: #ffce4a;}
			.headerMyAccount:hover,.headerLogout:hover {color: #c9c9c9;}
		.headerRightCart {float: left; margin-left: 10px; text-align: center; background-image:url('{{cdn '/assets/img/cart.png'}}'); background-repeat: no-repeat;  background-position: center; width: 60px; height: 44px; text-align: center; padding-right: 24px; margin-right: -24px; margin-top: 6px;}

.headerSub {position: absolute; padding-top: 162px; width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #e8e8e8; height: 30px; box-shadow: 0px 6px 10px -10px #000;}
	.headerSubLinks {float: right; margin-right: 3%;}
	.headerSubLinks li {float: left; list-style-type: none; margin-right: 40px; font: 18px Gotham Bold; line-height: .7em; margin-top: 4px;}
	.headerSubLinks li:hover {color: #a4a4a4;}
	.mobileLeftNav {margin-bottom: 10px; position: relative;}
	.mobileLeftNav li {color: #0064a3; font-weight: bold;}
	.mobileLeftNavAccount li {color: #ffbf11;}
	.mobileLeftNavAccount {position: absolute; right: 10px; top: 0px; background: #000; text-align: left; padding: 8px; background: #0064a3; line-height: 1.8em; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 4px;}

	.shopByBrand {float: left; margin-left: 3%;}
		.shopByBrandBars {float: left; margin-right: 10px; cursor: pointer;}
		.shopByBrandBar {width: 20px; height: 6px; border-top: 2px solid #08a4d7;}
		.shopBrandHeader {font: 16px Gotham Bold;}
		.leftNav {position: absolute; float: left; clear: left; padding-top: 16px; font: 14px Gotham Book; width: 210px; border: 1px solid #e8e8e8; border-top: none; background: #fff; margin-left: -20px; padding-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 30px; border-radius: 1px 1px 0px 0px; z-index: 200;}
		.leftNav li {list-style-type: none; margin-top: 0px; line-height: 1.6em; width: calc(100% - 20px); padding-left: 20px; position: relative;}
			.shopAllBrands {color: #0064a3; font-weight: bold; padding: 10px 0px 10px 0px}
			.featuredBrands {font: 12px Gotham Bold; padding-left: 20px; margin-bottom: 4px; margin-top: 4px;} 
		.leftNav li:hover {background: #ffce4a; }
		.leftNavBrand {width: 100%;}
		.noHover:hover {background: #fff;}

/******************** RESIZING HEADER ********************/
@media all and (max-width: 1400px){
	.weAccept {display: none;}
}

@media all and (max-width: 1280px){
	.headerTopLink {padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;}
	.headerTopLinkFirst {margin-left: 2%;}
	.headerPayPal {padding-top: 4px;}
	.headerCC {margin-right: 2%;}
	.headerTopLink .headerTriangle {margin-left: 6px;}
	.headerTopLinkBox {margin-left: -12px;}
}


@media all and (max-width: 1080px){.headerItalics {font-style: italic; display: none;}}
@media all and (max-width: 1060px){.searchBox {width: 40%;}}
@media all and (max-width: 800px){
	.headerTop {position: relative;}
	.headerLogo {width: 100%; text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; top: 4px;}
	.headerLogo img {width: 120px;}
	.headerRightBlock {display: none;}
	.headerTopLinkRight {display: none;}
	.searchBox {width: 90%; margin-top: 34px;}
	.headerRight {margin-top: 4px;}
	.headerMain {height: 124px; position: relative; top: -2px;}
	.search {font-size: 13px; width: 65%;}
	.submit {font-size: 13px; line-height: 3.5em;}
	.headerTopLinkFirst {margin-left: 0px; width: 34%;}
	.headerTopLink {width: 33%; text-align: center; padding: 0px;}
	.headerTopLinkBox {width: 100%; left: 0px; border-radius: 0px; padding: 0px; padding-bottom: 20px; margin-left: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-right: 0px;}
	.headerTopBoxInner {padding: 20px;}
	.headerSub {margin-top: 14px; z-index: 302; border-bottom: none; box-shadow: none; padding: none; padding-top: 0px; background: #ff0; height: 0px;}


	.shopByBrand {margin-top: -116px; z-index: 200; width: 60px; margin-left: 0px; padding: none;}
	.shopByBrandHover {width: 100%;}
	.shopBrandHeader {display: none;}
	.shopAllBrands {padding-top: 0px;}
	.shopByBrandBars {margin-left: 30px;}
	.shopByBrandBar {width: 20px; height: 6px; border-top: 2px solid #fff;}
	.leftNav {margin-top: 32px; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; opacity: 0; display: none; -o-transition:.2s; -ms-transition:.2s; -moz-transition:.2s; -webkit-transition:.2s; transition:.2s;}

	.headerSubScroll {position: fixed; margin-top: -22px;}
	.headerSubHover:hover .leftNav {opacity: 1; display: block;}
	.headerSubLinks {display: none;}
	.search {height: 38px;}
	.breadcrumbs {overflow: hidden;}
}
@media all and (max-width: 445px){
	.headerTopLink {font-size: 10px;}
	.headerTopLink .headerTriangle {width: 10px;}
	.headerRightCart {margin-right: 0px; position: absolute; right: 0px;}
}

.shopAllBrands {position: relative;}
.shopAllBrands:hover > .shopAllBrandsSub {display: block;}
.shopAllBrandsSub {width: 350px; padding-bottom: 30px;; background: #f7f7f7; position: absolute; left: 210px; top: 0px; display: none; border:3px solid #ffce4a; border-radius:0px 10px 10px 10px; z-index: 200;}
.navTriangle {width: 0px; height: 0px; border-top: 20px solid transparent; border-bottom: 20px solid transparent; border-left: 24px solid #ffce4a; position: absolute;}
#allBrandsLetters {margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 324px;}
.letter {width: 32px; height: 32px; background: #fff; border: 2px solid #08a4d7; color: #08a4d7; text-align: center; font: 18px Gotham Bold; border-radius: 6px; float: left; margin-right: 6px; margin-top: 6px; line-height: 1.9em;}
.letter:hover {background: #ffce4a; color: #0064a3;}
#allBrandsList {padding-top: 10px; clear: both; margin-left: 38px;}
#allBrandsList li {padding-left: 1.5em; text-indent:-1.5em;}
.letterHighlighted {background: #ffce4a; color: #0064a3;}
.featuredBrandsFlyout {width: 500px; height: 540px; padding: 10px 10px 30px 10px; background: #fff; position: absolute; left: 210px; top: 0px; display: none; border:3px solid #ffce4a; border-radius:10px 10px 10px 10px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 20px -10px #000; z-index: 200;}
.leftNav li:hover > .navTriangleSmall {display: block;}
.leftNav li:hover > .featuredBrandsFlyout {display: block;}
.navTriangleSmall {width: 0px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 210px; border-top: 11px solid transparent; border-bottom: 11px solid transparent; border-left: 12px solid #ffce4a; position: absolute; display: none; z-index: 200;}

@media all and (max-width: 800px){
	.shopAllBrands:hover > .shopAllBrandsSub {display: none;}
	.shopAllBrandsSub {left: 0px; z-index: 200; top: 20px; width: calc(100% - 6px); max-width: 530px; border-radius: 0px 0px 0px 0px; max-height: 400px; overflow-y: scroll;}
	.navTriangle {width: 0px; height: 0px; border-right: 20px solid transparent; border-left: 20px solid transparent; border-top: 24px solid #ffce4a; position: absolute;}
	.leftNav li:hover > .navTriangleSmall {display: none;}
	.leftNav li:hover > .featuredBrandsFlyout {display: none;}
}


/*** SECTION, PRODUCT AND PAGE CONTENT ***/
.body {padding-top: 192px;}
@media all and (max-width: 800px){
	.body {padding-top: 0px;}
}
.content {padding-top: 10px; margin-left: 4%; width: 94%;}
.breadcrumbs {margin: 0px; padding: 0px; height: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px;}
.breadcrumbs li {list-style-type: none; float: left; margin-right: 15px;}
.breadcrumbs li a {color: #999999; font: 13px Segoe UI,arial;}
.breadcrumbs li a:hover {color: #575757;}
.breadcrumbsInner:before {content: ""; border-color: transparent #c2c2c2; border-style: solid; border-width: 0.3em 0 0.3em 0.45em; margin-top: 0.3em; margin-right: 15px; float: left;} 

/*** SECTION LEFT NAV ***/
.leftSidebar {border: 1px solid #ebebeb; width: 250px; float: left; }
.leftSidebar div {-o-transition:.4s; -ms-transition:.4s; -moz-transition:.4s; -webkit-transition:.4s; transition:.4s;}
#categoryLogo {max-width: 90%; max-height: 100px; margin: 14px 0px;}
.leftSearch {width: 100%; padding: 10px 0px;}
.leftSearch span {clear: both; color: #0668a5; font: 18px Gotham Book; margin-left: 10px;}
.leftSearchLink span:before {content: ""; margin-left: 10px; width: 18px; height: 18px; border-radius: 18px; background: #ffce4a; float: left;}
.leftSearchLink:hover {background: #ebebeb;}
.leftFilters {border-top: 1px solid #ebebeb; width: 100%;}

.filterHeader {background: #0064a3; padding: 10px 0px; border-bottom: 3px solid #fff; }
.filterHeader:hover {background: #004a79; cursor: pointer;}
.filterHeader span {color: #fff; font: 18px Gotham Book; margin-left: 10px;}
.filterHeaderTriangle {float: right; color: #fff; font-size: 18px; margin-right: 10px; top: 10px; -o-transition:.4s; -ms-transition:.4s; -moz-transition:.4s; -webkit-transition:.4s; transition:.4s;}
.filterHeaderTriangle-rotate {ms-transform: rotate(90deg); -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg); transform: rotate(90deg); margin-right: 14px;}

/*** SECTION PAGE ***/
.section {float: left; width:calc(100% - 280px); margin-left: 20px;}
.sectionTitle {color: #0668a5; font: 28px Gotham Medium; line-height: 1.1em;}
.sectionDescription {margin-top: 6px; font: 16px Gotham Light;}

.productsHeader {width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #0668a5; text-align: center; margin-top: 20px;font: 24px Gotham Book; color: #0668a5; height: 13px;}
.productsHeader span {background: #fff; padding: 0px 18px;}
.productsHeader bold {font-family: Gotham Medium;}

.productsRow {margin-top: 20px; overflow: hidden; position: relative;}
.productsRow div {-o-transition:.4s; -ms-transition:.4s; -moz-transition:.4s; -webkit-transition:.4s; transition:.4s;}
.productBlock {float: left; width:200px; text-align: center; padding: 10px 10px; -o-transition:.6s; -ms-transition:.6s; -moz-transition:.6s; -webkit-transition:.6s; transition:.6s; position: relative;}
.productBlock:hover {background: #ebebeb; cursor: pointer;}
.productBlock:hover > .productCart {opacity: 1;}
.productImg {border: 1px solid #cccccc; width: 100%; height: 200px; text-align: center; position: relative; background: #fff;}
.productImg img {max-height: 95%; max-width: 95%; width: auto; height: auto; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; margin: auto;}
.productText {margin-top: 6px; font: 12px Segoe UI,arial; text-align: center; width: 90%; color: #5e5e5e; -o-transition:.6s; -ms-transition:.6s; -moz-transition:.6s; -webkit-transition:.6s; transition:.6s;}
.productPrice {text-align: center; width: 90%; font: 24px Gotham Light; color:  #0668a5; margin-top: 6px;}
.productCart {width: 100%; position: relative; background: #ffce4a; height: 16px; padding: 12px 0px; font: 16px Gotham Light; margin-top: 6px; display: block; opacity: 0;}
.productCart:hover {background: #ffba00;  -o-transition:.6s; -ms-transition:.6s; -moz-transition:.6s; -webkit-transition:.6s; transition:.6s;}
.productCartImg {width: 30px; margin-left: 6px; float: left;}
.productCartImg img {width: 30px;}
.productCartSpan {width:calc(100% - 72px); text-align: center; float: left;}
.productCart input {position: absolute; width: 100%; background: none; opacity: 1; border: 0px; box-shadow: none; height: 100%; left: 0px; top: 0px; cursor: pointer;}
.productBlock loading {color: #979595; line-height: 10em;}
.productBlock .loadingImage {margin-top: 34px;}
.productCartOOS {background: #bdbdbd;}
.productCartOOS:hover {background: #bdbdbd; cursor: default;}
.notifyMeFrame {position: relative; height: 50px; max-width: 330px;}
.notifyMe {font: 14px Gotham Medium; background: #ffce4a; color: #000; padding: 10px; max-width: 330px; border-radius: 3px; margin-top: 10px; -o-transition:.3s; -ms-transition:.3s; -moz-transition:.3s; -webkit-transition:.3s; transition:.3s;}
.notifyMe:hover {background: #ffba00; cursor: pointer;}
.productOverlay {position: absolute; top: 0; margin-top: 6px; width: 90%; background: none; text-align: left;}
.productOverlay img {width: 40%;}

.featuredFrame .productOverlay img {width: 40%;}
.featuredFrame .productOverlay {left: 0%;}

.image-only .productImg {border-bottom: 0px;}
.image-only .productPrice {display: none;}
.image-only .productText {display: none;}

.filterBlock {max-height: 256px; display: none; overflow-y: scroll; margin-bottom: 10px; position: relatve; width:calc(100% - 4px);}
::-webkit-scrollbar {-webkit-appearance: none; width: 7px;} 
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {border-radius: 4px; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.15); -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,.5);}

.filterBlock ul {padding: 0px 8px; margin-top: 6px;}
.filterBlock li {list-style-type: none; font: 13px Gotham Book; color: #5e5e5e; line-height: 1.6em; overflow: hidden; height: 20px;}
.filter-option::before {content: ''; display: inline-block; background: #fff; width: 10px; height: 10px; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; margin-right: 6px;}
.filter-selected::before {content: '\2713'; display: inline-block; background: #fff; width: 10px; height: 10px; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; margin-right: 6px; line-height: .8em; color: #888;}
.filterBlock li:hover {color: #b9b8b8;}
.filterLoading {padding-left: 6px; font: 13px Gotham Book; color: #5e5e5e;}
.filterRemove {padding-bottom: 8px; padding-top: 8px;}
.filterRemove li {list-style-type: none; font: 13px Gotham Book; margin-left: 10px; color: #777; background: #eee; padding: 6px; border-radius: 3px; width: calc(100% - 28px); margin-bottom: 4px;}
.filterRemove span {float: right; margin-right: 6px;}

.sectionsHeader {font-size: 36px; line-height: .7em; display: none;}

.section-blocks .productText {background: #fff; width: 100%; border: 1px solid #0064a3; margin-top: 0px; height: 50px; font-size: 14px; color: #0064a3; line-height: 1em;}
.section-blocks .productImg {border-color: #0064a3; border-bottom: 0px;}
.section-blocks .productBlock:hover > .productText {background: #0064a3; color: #fff;}
.section-blocks .productText div {position: relative; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);}
.categoryId {float: right; font-size: 11px; color: #aaa; margin-bottom: 6px;}
.featured-products-full .productsRow-inner {width: 50000px;}
.featured-products-full {width:calc(100% - 76px); float: left;}
.featured-products-full .productText {height: 50px; overflow: hidden;}
.featured-products-full .productBlock {height: 338px;}

.productText div {-o-transition:.0s; -ms-transition:.0s; -moz-transition:.0s; -webkit-transition:.0s; transition:.0s;}
.productBlock-minimized {height: 256px;}
//.productBlock-minimized:hover {height: auto;}

.productBlock-minimized .productText {height: 36px; overflow: hidden;}
.productBlock-minimized .productPrice {height: 0px; overflow: hidden;}
